title: Redskins draft talk, roster reset, 2018 expectations (Football 05/03)
description:
Grant Paulsen of 106.7 the Fan in DC joins Will Brinson to talk all things Redskins. The guys dive into the draft decisions by Washington, going with Da'Ron Payne early and then adding Derrius Guice, discuss how the running back depth chart will look, examine whether the offense can be any good and what the fatal flaw will be for that side of the ball, question if there's enough on that team defensively to take a leap, wonder if Alex Smith's 2017 season is real or not and figure out an interesting tendency for Bruce Allen drafting.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: Grant Paulsen joins Will Brinson to discuss everything Redskins, the newest additions to Washington via the draft and what the fatal flaw on either side of the ball will be.
